\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*: \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w helper|strong="H5826"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fighteth \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H3063"\w* encouraged \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w these|strong="H5971"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Ezechias \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda.

Doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* Ezechias deceive \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w hunger|strong="H7458"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*, affirming \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrians?
